allow-half.description: Only half of the icons are allowed to be activated

clearable.description: Whether it can be cleared or not, the value will be set to null after clicking the icon corresponding to the current value
clearable.description_zh: 是否可清空，在点击当前值对应的图标后值会被设为 null

color.description_zh: 已激活图标颜色（支持形如 `#FFF`， `#FFFFFF`， `yellow`，`rgb(0, 0, 0)` 的颜色）

:default-value.description: The default number of active icons is 0 before 2.33.0
:default-value.description_zh: 默认已激活图标个数，2.33.0 前默认值为 0

:value.description: The number of icons that have been activated

events.name: clear
events.description: Clear the callback for the current value

events.name: update:value
events.description: Triggers when the number of activation icons changes
events.description_zh: 激活图标个数改变时触发
